level.heading: Effective date.
level.text: The provisions of this chapter shall take effect pursuant to § 1-206.02(c)(1) and shall govern all mental health information regardless of when such information came into existence. However, the provisions of this chapter which create liabilities shall only apply to acts or failures to act which occur on or after the effective date.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 2-136
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 2-136, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 7-1201.01.
